title: AI projects now exceed 350,000, according to Stanford
description: Of which about 3.5 will still be around in five years?

title: Announcing .NET MAUI in .NET 8 Preview 3
description: This release we are focusing on improving the quality of the UI controls, layout, and memory management. Also new in .NET 8 we are introducing NuGet packages for your flexibility to preview future builds and lock your applications to a specific version.

title: Building Android apps with Jenkins: an introduction
description: Mobile app development requires unique CI/CD practices, due to the specific needs of the mobile app ecosystem, the specialized expertise required, and the need for a separate pipeline for deployment.

title: By popular demand: Windows LAPS available now!
description: By popular demand: a feature I've never heard of or knew was needed

title: ChatGPT on Android with OpenAI
description: Inspired by Syncfusion’s blog post on adding ChatGPT to their .NET blazor text editor, in this post I’m going to add a similar feature to our existing Android Source Editor sample.

title: Developer creates “regenerative” AI program that fixes bugs on the fly
description: "I'm the best there is at what I do, but what I do isn't very nice"

title: Don’t call it Rust: Community complains about draft trademark policy restricting use of ‘word marks’
description: Coming soon - new C naming guidelines that prohibit you from using the letter C in any variable name

title: Elon Musk reportedly purchases thousands of GPUs for generative AI project at Twitter
Excel Labs is a new Microsoft Garage add-in that adds OpenAI-based generative AI to Excel
description: Maybe the AI can balance your finances

title: Migrating extensive Xamarin native apps (with Xamarin.Forms Embedding) to .NET 7

title: OpenAI will pay you to hunt for ChatGPT bugs
Part 2: Things to Consider When Planning Your Migration from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI
description: What steps should you take when preparing to migrate your app from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI? This list will help you think it through.

title: Semicolon at the end of a comment line
description: Better than at the beginning of a declaration line

title: Signs It’s Time to Migrate Your Cordova App
description: Despite its decreasing popularity, and a shortening list of tools to support the development of apps with the SDK, it’s estimated that around 180 companies (including many fortune 500 companies) still use Cordova in their tech stack. With months of no updates, many are finding themselves looking for an alternative platform.

title: The world is getting smaller!
description: I won't even mention the song, as it's already in your head

title: What's new in multiplatform Jetpack libraries
description: The multiplatform Collections and DataStore libraries are now moving from experimental developer previews to alpha releases, and will follow the normal release cycle of Jetpack libraries. Annotations, a core Jetpack library, is now also available for multiplatform.
